TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted... you notice that people is more offensive now

I wish i could bring jebediah to earth!

Granted, the national language is now Engriwsh

I wish I'd get up at 10:00 AM more often

granted.... uh.... now you uh... want to get up at 1:00 PM

I wish i could stop... HALP!!!

Granted, but instead of stopping you get killed...

I wish we'd stop posting already!

Granted but now we are possesed by Forum beast an keep typing

I wish i could sleep

NOPE NOPE NOPE

I wish that Congress would get the $hit together that or we should kick them all out of office/revok there paycheck

Granted, they are all fired and America is left without a legislative body.

I wish I could travel back in time and witness the early politics of the United States.

granted but I go with you (we don't even have a real government right now)

I still wish for the same thing

Granted... When you go back to present apparently USA doesnt exist anymore and the reds are on the mun having a Soviet party

I wish i could party whit them

granted but the granting thing can not compute "whit"

I wish for 42

Granted... When you go back to present apparently USA doesnt exist anymore and the reds are on the mun having a Soviet party

I wish i could party whit them

granted but then they imprison you in a gulag

I wish Auburn will win the BCS championship this year

To Briansun1:

Granted... POWER OF THE ANSWER OF THE UNIVERSE *and your head explodes*

I wish my N-1 doesnt explode after 1 hour of building it

To Briansun1:

Granted... POWER OF THE ANSWER OF THE UNIVERSE *and your head explodes*

I wish my N-1 doesnt explode after 1 hour of building it

before i corrupt your wish

is it the N1 by the sovets or N1 from star wars

Obviously the soviet Rocket!

*Continue circulating nothing to see here*

granted to works to well and takes you to the edge of the map with a solar system and a planet called earth in it

I wish

Granted... now all your family died

I wish my rocketeer Titan rocket series are ready for the exchange this weekend

Granted, but the forums go down.

I wish I played more KSP

Granted... you never come back to forums

I wish i could get a nice looking Kethane Driller whit great performance

Granted, it has no place to store the Kethane

I wish the ski slopes here would open.

Granted, But I shall not corrupt this

I wish I'd close my cookie clicker in the background
Granted, but it reopens directly afterwards.

...

I wish I didn't get addicted to cookie clicker

Granted instead you sing that song

I guess that might be my fault...

I wish for ribbons

Granted, no one cares

I wish for the mods to allow me to post my gifs once more.

nope

I wish that the school would stop playing stupid "techno" music
